Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Heath A. Wadhams, a part-time police officer, with the village of Palmyra police department to take the civil service examination
Summary: Authorizes Heath A. Wadhams, a part-time police officer, with the village of Warsaw police department to take the civil service examination and be eligible for appointment as a full time police officer for the village of Palmyra, in the county of Wayne.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Heath A. Wadhams to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time police officer for the village of Palmyra
